description: 2-White numbers (take power 2, sum 2 digit groups to get same number).
comments: Also, apart from initial 0, the full list of 2-Kaprekar numbers.
references: Italo Ghersi, Matematica dilettevole e curiosa, pag. 190, Hoepli, Milano, 1967. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 22 2010]
links: D. E. Iannucci, The Kaprekar numbers, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 3, 2000, #1.2.
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
author: _Erich Friedman_
